title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression using row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like "row[0] equals to 0", the result set is incorrect or null.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with "row[0] equals to 0" and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: As a developer said, row[0] can only be generated after all the data has been fetched. Row[0] cannot be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a filter in the data set with "row[0] equals to 0".
2. Click on the Preview tab.
